name: Libsquid.GitHub.io
tagline: The Spherical-Cube Quad-Tree Unique ID Library
body: This is the web site for the **Spherical-Cube Quad-Tree Unique ID Library** (**LibSQUID**).  The purpose of this library is to provide a set of tools for indexing/dividing a set of data on a spherical coordinate system (i.e. geospatial metadata) using a quad-tree indexing scheme applied to a quad-cube cartographic projection.  Four projections are supported: Tangental (TSC), COBE (CSC), Quadrilateralized (QSC), and HEALpix (HSC).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
